            <tei-zone points="1566,1859 1560,2176 1542,2200 1355,2205 1347,2223 1263,2226 1263,2222 975,2222 975,1760 1580,1760" id="eSc_textblock_67364924" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1200,2247 1536,2278 1595,2331 1601,2436 1432,2471 1389,2524 1293,2551 523,2551 523,2502 525,2495 470,2459 401,2459 372,2430 370,2240 1200,2240" id="eSc_textblock_629a134c" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1623,1516 1623,199 4,199 4,1516" id="eSc_textblock_6d39cd4a" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>

    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_2ad2cdc7" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Valkyries thunder through the storm
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>-
            <tei-seg ana="#phantom_body" resp="#np" type="topic slogan" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                when Phantom Fingers play
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_81452811" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>These are the Phantom
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Hands of a thousand
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>immortal pianists; their
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>glorious
            genius preserv-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ed forever, through the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>miracle of
            <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">
                Welte-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Mignon*
            </tei-name>
            reproduction.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_9280ed63" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Who but a
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/119466821" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Samaroff</tei-persName> can achieve
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the crashing fortissimo with
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>which <tei-persName type="composer" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Wagner</tei-persName>
            meant his glorious
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>composition to be played? Or,
            <tei-seg ana="#suit_every_mood" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                as
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>your mood changes
            </tei-seg>, who but
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116014490" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">de<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Pachmann</tei-persName>
            can so entrance you
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>with <tei-persName type="composer" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Chopin's</tei-persName> sensuous Nocturne?
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>True music-lovers are satisfied only
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>with the world's greatest masters.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon*</tei-name> satisfies in this
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>respect as well as in the
            <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                uncanny
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>fidelity
            </tei-seg> with which it reproduces
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_67364924" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the renditions of the scores of
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>master musicians who have played
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>upon it.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#invisibility" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon*</tei-name> is invisible
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>and does not interfere with manual
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>playing. It is obtainable in practi-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>cally every good make of piano,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>both grand and upright. Write
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>for interesting brochure. <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Auto-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Pneumatic Action</tei-orgName> Co.,
            <tei-persName data-origname="persName">
                W. C.
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Heaton, President
            </tei-persName>, <tei-address data-origname="address">12th Ave., at
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>51st St., New York.</tei-address>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_629a134c" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>(Licensee)</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Hear it-in comparison. There's a nearby dealer
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>*Licensed under the original <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> patents.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6d39cd4a" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6b35e21e" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
